Package plateau

Class Board

java.lang.Object
plateau.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents a game board with cells , streets , and rooms

    • perceRue

      public void perceRue(int xd, int yd, int larg, int haut, boolean isFirstIteration)
      Creats streets on the board based on the specified parameters
      Parameters:
      xd - X coordinate of the top left corner
      yd - Y coordinate of the top left corner
      larg - width of the area to be pierced
      haut - height of the area to be pierced
      isFirstIteration - Indicate whether it is the firste iteration

    • initDoors

      public void initDoors(List<Room> rooms)
      Initializes the doors for each room on the board , closing them by default
      Parameters:
      rooms - The list of rooms on the board

    • createDoors

      public void createDoors()
      Creates doors betwen areas . each room cell has doors connecting it to neighboring cells ( up , down, left , right )

    • openStreetDoors

      public void openStreetDoors()
      Opens doors between street cells in the game board. Iterates over each cell in the board, and if the current cell and its neighboring cells are all street cells, opens the corresponding doors between them.

    • specialRooms

      public void specialRooms()
      Replaces two randomly selected rooms from the board with special rooms : one with a Continental and the other with a Pharmacy

    • description

      public String description()
      Gets a textual representation of the game board
      Returns:
      A string representing the game board with descriptions of each cell.

    • descriptionDoors

      public void descriptionDoors()
      Displays the description of doors for each cell in the game board. Iterates over each cell in the board and displays the description of doors based on the specified index. The index determines which part of the door's description to display. - For index 0, displays the upper part of the door. - For indexes 1 and 2, displays the middle and lower parts of the door, respectively.
